items.name: static let baseURL: NSAttributedString.DocumentReadingOptionKey
items.desc: The base URL for HTML documents.

items.name: static let defaultAttributes: NSAttributedString.DocumentReadingOptionKey
items.desc: The default attributes to apply to plain files.

items.name: static let readAccessURL: NSAttributedString.DocumentReadingOptionKey
items.desc: The local files WebKit can access when loading content.

items.name: static let textSizeMultiplier: NSAttributedString.DocumentReadingOptionKey
items.desc: The scale factor for font sizes.

items.name: static let timeout: NSAttributedString.DocumentReadingOptionKey
items.desc: The time, in seconds, to wait for a document to finish loading.

items.name: static let webResourceLoadDelegate: NSAttributedString.DocumentReadingOptionKey
items.desc: An object to serve as the web resource loading delegate.

items.name: init(String)
items.desc: Creates a document reading option key with the specified raw value.

items.desc: Creates a document reading option key with the specified raw value.
